segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, making everything wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the puddle growing larger and larger on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the water streaming down them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just stands there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked neatly, but for how long?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are making a mess too, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool is about to tip over, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
